text: Nguoi (hoi Thien Su) hay noi voi ho: “Cac nguoi hay cau nguyen nhung ke ma cac nguoi cho rang (chung la than linh cua cac nguoi) ngoai Allah. Qua that, chung khong he nam giu va chi phoi bat cu vat gi trong cac tang troi va trai đat, cho du đo chi la suc nang cua hat nguyen tu; va chung khong he co bat cu phan chia nao trong troi đat nay; va trong bon chung khong he co bat cu ten nao la vi ung ho cua Ngai ca.”
